tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SAS_Analytics (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    data_source VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    model_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE sas_analytics_data_sources (
    data_source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_source_name VARCHAR(255),
    data_source_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_source_connection_string TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE predictive_models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    model_description TEXT,
    model_accuracy FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE model_training_data (
    training_data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    data_source_id INT,
    training_data_location TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES predictive_models(model_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (data_source_id) REFERENCES sas_analytics_data_sources(data_source_id)
)

CREATE TABLE prediction_results (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    input_data TEXT,
    predicted_value FLOAT,
    prediction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES predictive_models(model_id)
)

CREATE TABLE data_integration_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT
)
